survey_name: Corporate Travel Booking Platform Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the company's corporate travel booking platform, identifying pain points and areas for improvement to enhance user experience and efficiency.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the corporate travel booking platform for work-related travel arrangements?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This helps segment users by frequency of use.

script.question_text: How often do you use the corporate travel booking platform for work-related travel arrangements?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in the travel booking platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. This identifies high-value features.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in the travel booking platform? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how would you rate the overall ease of use of the travel booking platform? (1 = Very difficult, 5 = Very easy)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale. Ensure mobile-friendly display of radio buttons in a horizontal layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons in horizontal layout)

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how would you rate the overall ease of use of the travel booking platform? (1 = Very difficult, 5 = Very easy)
